comment: Bought this without tasting, bad idea. Taste horrible

This was the moonshine aged in virgin American white oak. Interestingly not ex bourbon casks but virgin oak like bourbon. Again with corn it's almost like a bourbon product in the base inputs but not output i.e. taste.  They did say they distilled 20 times up to 90%. Again interesting as I thought 3 to 4 times was the limit for whiskey. It's almost vodka like in this aspect. I got vanilla coming through. It was nice but I think weirdly I preferred the Moonshine spirit.
